Text: Don Giovanni (] ; K. 527; complete title: "Il dissoluto punito, ossia il Don Giovanni" , literally "The Rake Punished, namely Don Giovanni" or "The Libertine Punished") is an opera in two acts with music by Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart and Italian libretto by Lorenzo Da Ponte.
